snippet: Top editors discussed columns by The Post’s media critic that criticize a reporter at Politico.
abstract: Fred Hiatt, editorial page editor at The Washington Post and John F Harris, editor in chief of Politico, try to mend rift between their news organizations; discuss columns by The Post’s media critic Erik Wemple that criticize Politico reporter Mike Allen.
lead_paragraph: Top editors discussed columns by The Post’s media critic that criticize a reporter at Politico.

headline.main: Washington Post and Politico Talk About a Rift
headline.print_headline: Washington News Outlets Address a Dispute
